column1: Astrophysics is the study of how stars and planets work
column2: and how we can learn about them. Astrophysicists use physics to explain what astronomers find and see.Astrophysics is also the study of how the Universe started and how it is changing with time. This part of astrophysics is called cosmology. For a long time bodies in the sky seemed to be unchanging spheres moving in a circle. But on Earth growth and decay happened
column3: and natural motion was in a straight line. Therefore
